author: Dana Howl
description:
Head to https://gamefound.com/projects/cardboard-dynamo/grave-trigger?refcode=h8tQtBU_ykGDypbkTqxEEw to support Grave Trigger on Gamefound today!!! (affiliate link)

In this video I tell you all about the new miniatures game GRAVE TRIGGER and all the elements that I think make it a unique new entry into the miniatures game scene.

My Website: https://howlcorp.com
Support Me on PATREON: https://patreon.com/danahowl

Stevia Sphere - "Abandoned Project Ideas"

title: Grave Trigger Really Hits Different in 2025... (I'm Mildly Obsessed with this Miniatures Game)
